name: Anemic Panic
description:
NOTE: MAKE SURE TO PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN MODE!

CONTROLS: 

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to bite the villagers

In Anemic Panic, you take control of a moonwalking vampire whose only goal is to "return" the blood he has taken from his victims. Explore the town of Morbania and amass a cult following with your blood. Be careful not to stay too long in the dark, as your sensitivity to darkness will drain your blood quickly.

Created with Unity for the Codeing Blocks Game Jam '23.

Selected theme: everything is backwards.

Collaborators:

  • munij: Designer, Programmer, Writer
  • luisjakg: Programmer, Designer, Artist, Composer
  • deRedBlob: Programmer, Designer, Artist
  • m3llad0: Programmer, Designer
